short.value: Current status of the device usage.
Date when the device was implantable to the patient or the external device was first in use.

definition.value: Date when the device was implantable to the patient or the external device was first in use.

short.value: Date when the device was explanted from the patient or the external device was no longer in use.

definition.value: Date when the device was explanted from the patient or the external device was no longer in use.

short.value: The details of the device used.

definition.value: The details of the device used.

short.value: Anatomical location of the device. May include laterality.

definition.value: Anatomical location of the device. May include laterality.

short.value: Reason or justification for the use of the device.

definition.value: Reason or justification for the use of the device.

short.value: Who reported the device was being used by the patient.

definition.value: Who reported the device was being used by the patient.

short.value: Note about the device statement that were not represented at all or sufficiently in one of the attributes provided in a class. These may include for example a comment, an instruction, or a note associated with the statement.

definition.value: Note about the device statement that were not represented at all or sufficiently in one of the attributes provided in a class. These may include for example a comment, an instruction, or a note associated with the statement.
